comments.body:
There doesn't seem to be an `addDefaultingFuncs` in this pkg ref: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/apis/scheduling/v1beta1/defaults.go

Should there be one? This needs to be fixed for tests to pass.
/lgtm cancel
looks like it just got deleted in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/1a1b7001d6e5dbc8f2f363a39e684fb58da35ddb#diff-55191462e82a442246b6c7b9bcd928c9

@liggitt @alejandrox1 thanks for your review. 

I add the `addDefaultingFuncs ` func into the `defaults.go` like other `apis` pkg.
